label: Coordinate
comment: A map coordinate defined by a lattitude & longditude pair.

datatypeProperties.comment: The latitude of a map location expressed in decimal degrees (between +90 and -90) where negative values represent latitudes south of the equator.
The longditude of a map location expressed in decimal degrees (between +180 and -180) where negative values represent longditudes west of the prime meridian.

referencedBy.comment: The list of coordinates that define a closed area polygon as a location boundary.
The latitude and logditude coordinates that best represent the specified location
